#summary Guide for users looking to start off with JBSim.
#labels Type-User,Featured

= Quick Start =

  # Download the latest version of JBSim from the [http://code.google.com/p/botballsim/downloads/list downloads] page. Look for an entry with the "Featured" label for the latest stable version.
  # Extract the .zip file to any convenient location.
  # If your system does not have Java installed, download and install it from the [http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp Sun website]. You probably want a JRE (Java Runtime Environment).
  # Double-click on the extracted JAR file to launch the simulator.

For advanced users, try the BuildingFromSource page.
